data.title: 准备以至少20秒的时间回答以下问题
data.answer: Although some people believe that developers should be permitted to develop untouched areas including coastlines or jungles, I tend to agree that they should never be permitted to develop on these types of areas. Some people think that if these areas can be developed in a nice way, it could well help attract more visitors to come and visit. As a result, the local economy could be benefited from the booming tourist industry. However, I believe that developing on coastlines or jungles might sabotage the local ecosystems, which leads to detrimental impacts on the local environment. Secondly, many untouched areas have rich cultural and historical meanings. If developers change it, these areas are not intact anymore and might lose its meanings.
data.referenceText: Should developers be allowed to develop untouched areas such as coastlines or jungle so that more people can visit them.
data.referenceTranslate: 开发商应该被允许开发未开发的地区，如海岸线或丛林，以便更多的人可以访问它们。
